updates.title: Songwriting Competition!
updates.description:
Show off your musicality by performing to this backing track!
You can rap, sing, do a mashup, improvise a jazz solo, or anything else!

updates.title: February Beatnik 2021!
updates.description:
February Beatnik 2021 was a success!
Congrats to everyone who performed.
updates.details:
The video will be on YouTube soon.
Subscribe to stay updated!
